Name: Dead Containment
About the game: Taking On-Rails Shooters Off Rails Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade light gun games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets. Play solo or with a friend over online play, collect hidden pickups to boost your score, rise up the online leaderboards and prove to your friends why you would survive a zombie outbreak. Features Solo and Online Co-op Light gun support Boss fights Multiple paths - Player chosen and hidden paths Rankings Online leaderboards 2 game modes - Arcade and 1 Credit mode A classic arcade experience Coming Soon More levels Achievements Armoury Full controller support
